attachments.title: Having issues connecting to membershipservice with HFC v0.6.2 · Issue #45 · IBM-Blockchain/ibm-blockchain-issues · GitHub
attachments.text: Hello everyone! Trying to enroll user to bluemix membership service and keep getting code:2 error. Please help! (the certificate is there and readable, errors would have risen otherwise) Current t...
attachments.fallback: GitHub: Having issues connecting to membershipservice with HFC v0.6.2 · Issue #45 · IBM-Blockchain/ibm-blockchain-issues

text:
Hi All, just an FYI if you have an issue assigned to you, use story point going forward to provide the estimated sizing. The breakdown is as follows:

Use story points to indicated relative effort:

1 point   <  1 day
2 points     1-2 days
4 points    1 week
8 points    2 weeks

<@U2HEHNF27> this is a question for the <#C1GSVKK1U|fabric-sdk-node> channel, this channel is for questions and discussions among the code contributors. that said, we don’t currently support a path that doesn’t require an enrolled user in order to submit a transaction.
